desc: A 100% "natural" blend of medical grade plant essences! Get multiple healing and protective benefits! Health and wellness body oil for avid surfers! Scientifically "proven" to effectively kill both land and sea bacteria!

layout.text: A DING KIT FOR YOUR SURF BOD
GET MULTIPLE HEALING AND PROTECTIVE BENEFITS!
